name: Aurius
loreDescription: Legendary hero Knight Commander Rowell's tower shield.

skillDescription.base: Increases the Defense of allies by 10%, and takes 10% of the damage suffered by them. When more than one damage sharing effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.
skillDescription.max: Increases the Defense of allies by 10%, and takes 20% of the damage suffered by them. When more than one damage sharing effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.
